channel.title: RamyScape Beta Period Has Started!
channel.description:
[size=20pt][url=http://www.ramyincorperated.smfforfree.com]Forums[/url]
[size=35pt]TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES, T2 ERRORS, SERVER TEMPORARILY DOWN TO FIX IT, SORRY![/size][size=19pt]This Is A Non-Hamachi Server[/size]
[size=15pt][glow=gold,2,300][blue]RamyScape Beta Period Has Started, It will continue for about a week or so, all are welcome as testers, but nothing which is done on the test period will be saved, once that period is over, the only thing that will be saved is the bugs each person found, the person who is most useful will be awarded Mod Status! The way to report bugs and get yourself some bug hunting points is by typing ::bug (bug here), anything that you think is a bug should be reported and there is no need to say your name, i will know.so come and take a look at the once legendary server with a bit of updates![/blue][/glow][/size]
Please Rejoin and make the once legendary RamyScape once again the best server of all time.
[glow=red,2,300]Note:[/glow] if u get a your account is already logged in you must wait 10 seconds before trying again or else it will reject ur connection and tell u server is offline, please don't keep trying without waiting, because that will result in an ip ban since i cant c the name ur logging in with.
[glow=pink,2,300]Server Crashes[/glow] We don't crash anymore except rarely! but when we do its because of players not us so please don't complain to us about it, we do all we can
[glow=white,2,300]Updates:[/glow] Read the ::paper and look for stuff that you haven't seen before on there especially page 2 of it =]
[glow=maroon,2,300][size=15pt]Note: Ownage is NOT the owner[/size][/glow] [glow=teal,2,300][size=15pt]The owner is Master Ramy(ME)[/glow][/size]
[glow=teal,2,300]Ip for non-hamachi:[/glow] [size=20pt]Ramyscape.no-ip.info[/size]
Some Of Many Commands [glow=grey,2,300]::paper[/glow] - a "news paper" full of commands and teles to training spots ::capes - a collection of team capes ::morecapes - more team capes ::cbrunes - 1k of each combat rune ::arrows - a collection of arrows from bronze to rune ::archer - a suit fit for a pro ranger And many, many more!
All but maybe 3 skills don't work! Easy to make money Staff are friendly and not stuck up or abuse rights Drop partys!
A screen shot of over [glow=teal,2,300]80[/glow] people on ramyscape! [img]http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/9804/screenshot4wf5.png[/img]
A picture of how u can smith trimmed armor (everyone can smith it but u need miminum of 100 smithing) [img]http://img57.imageshack.us/img57/3664/screenshot5bw2.png[/img]
A picture of how u can smith dragon and granite [img]http://img118.imageshack.us/img118/6516/screenshot6rk5.png[/img]
A pic of the barrows shop [img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/4655/screenshot7uv4.png[/img]
The dragon weapon shop by the wild [img]http://img56.imageshack.us/img56/2928/screenshot8ws1.png[/img]
The glove shop [img]http://img223.imageshack.us/img223/5936/screenshot9ro5.png[/img]
The boot shop [img]http://img56.imageshack.us/img56/3458/screenshot10su3.png[/img]
Rare shop [img]http://img107.imageshack.us/img107/6606/screenshot11uq9.png[/img]
God armor shop [img]http://img58.imageshack.us/img58/4967/screenshot12ni3.png[/img]
The varrock town center [img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/8481/heresd4.png[/img]
The steel dragon training area (::steeldragon) [img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/7654/screenshot15ck6.png[/img]
The kalphite queen layer (::kalph) [img]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/5966/screenshot16kw9.png[/img]
Troll training arena (::troll1) [img]http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/7998/screenshot17rb9.png[/img]
Mummy training arena (::mummy) [img]http://img160.imageshack.us/img160/3040/screenshot18nq5.png[/img]
The dueling arena training arena [img]http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/5955/screenshot19rh8.png[/img]
The taverly dungeon training area (::taverly) [img]http://img168.imageshack.us/img168/1914/screenshot20os1.png[/img]
Fight pits training arena [img]http://img168.imageshack.us/img168/2146/screenshot21in6.png[/img]
Dag kings training area [img]http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/7087/screenshot22zu5.png[/img]
Enjoy Ramyscape and if u need any help with commands or anything contact me via ramyscape
[img]http://img111.imageshack.us/img111/7236/screenshot13cx3.png[/img]
Thanks to Ownage a.k.a. Death666 for original post, thanks to me, Master Ramy for modifying and updating post, come join us!
~Master Ramy, Proud Owner, Maker And Founder Of RamyScape And Ramy Inc.

item.title: RamyScape Beta Period Has Started!
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“Prince Ramy, post:14, topic:119311”]they had advertisment section but they erased it, so too bad, and zoltanman u got an advertisment just a couple posts down from mine so really u shouldnt be talking![/quote]this forum gets wors by the day i really mean wors every fucking second this forum offers nothing but helpless players that ask how to start a server…the last hope (a big tutorial section) has been deleted and rune server has taken the upper hand,it supports selling and buying,has a very big tut list and people out there are allot more friendly…its time to face the truth mopar is kinda lozing hes spirit.

Read full topic

item.title: RamyScape Beta Period Has Started!
item.dc:creator: @Prince_Ramy Prince Ramy
item.description:
@Prince_Ramy wrote:

[size=20pt]Forums

[size=35pt]TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES, T2 ERRORS, SERVER TEMPORARILY DOWN TO FIX IT, SORRY![/size][size=19pt]This Is A Non-Hamachi Server[/size]

[size=15pt][glow=gold,2,300][blue]RamyScape Beta Period Has Started, It will continue for about a week or so, all are welcome as testers, but nothing which is done on the test period will be saved, once that period is over, the only thing that will be saved is the bugs each person found, the person who is most useful will be awarded Mod Status! The way to report bugs and get yourself some bug hunting points is by typing ::bug (bug here), anything that you think is a bug should be reported and there is no need to say your name, i will know.so come and take a look at the once legendary server with a bit of updates![/blue][/glow][/size]

Please Rejoin and make the once legendary RamyScape once again the best server of all time.

[glow=red,2,300]Note:[/glow] if u get a your account is already logged in you must wait 10 seconds before trying again or else it will reject ur connection and tell u server is offline, please don’t keep trying without waiting, because that will result in an ip ban since i cant c the name ur logging in with.

[glow=pink,2,300]Server Crashes[/glow]
We don’t crash anymore except rarely! but when we do its because of players not us so please don’t complain to us about it, we do all we can

[glow=white,2,300]Updates:[/glow]
Read the ::paper and look for stuff that you haven’t seen before on there especially page 2 of it =]

[glow=maroon,2,300][size=15pt]Note: Ownage is NOT the owner[/size][/glow]
[glow=teal,2,300][size=15pt]The owner is Master Ramy(ME)[/glow][/size]

[glow=teal,2,300]Ip for non-hamachi:[/glow] [size=20pt]Ramyscape.no-ip.info[/size]

Some Of Many Commands
[glow=grey,2,300]::paper[/glow] - a “news paper” full of commands and teles to training spots
::capes - a collection of team capes
::morecapes - more team capes
::cbrunes - 1k of each combat rune
::arrows - a collection of arrows from bronze to rune
::archer - a suit fit for a pro ranger
And many, many more!

All but maybe 3 skills don’t work!
Easy to make money
Staff are friendly and not stuck up or abuse rights
Drop partys!

A screen shot of over [glow=teal,2,300]80[/glow] people on ramyscape!

A picture of how u can smith trimmed armor (everyone can smith it but u need miminum of 100 smithing)

A picture of how u can smith dragon and granite

A pic of the barrows shop

The dragon weapon shop by the wild

The glove shop

The boot shop

Rare shop

God armor shop

The varrock town center

The steel dragon training area (::steeldragon)

The kalphite queen layer (::kalph)

Troll training arena (::troll1)

Mummy training arena (::mummy)

The dueling arena training arena

The taverly dungeon training area (::taverly)

Fight pits training arena

Dag kings training area

Enjoy Ramyscape and if u need any help with commands or anything contact me via ramyscape

Thanks to Ownage a.k.a. Death666 for original post, thanks to me, Master Ramy for modifying and updating post, come join us!

~Master Ramy, Proud Owner, Maker And Founder Of RamyScape And Ramy Inc.
